question: World Bank has granted USD 825 million loan for this country's infrastructure.
explanation: World Bank has granted USD 825 million loan Pakistan for upgrading its energy and public finance sectors. World Bank has stated that, USD 425 million out of the total loan would be used to modernise Pakistan's national power grid. Remaining USD 400 million loan will be deployed to improve the management of public finances which would consequentially improve the delivery of health and education services.
